stories.name: Polygon Data Rendered with "Select Renderer" turns to Point Data When "Explored" in Results Drawer
stories.desc:
As a user, I expect data/map layers that render as polygons to remain polygons when displayed/viewed using the Explore feature in the Results drawer.

All layers within "Market Share" or "County Health Rankings" folders are the best examples. See attached video.

Occurs when polygon data sets are rendered with "Select Renderer"

stories.name: Legend Title When Using Explore View
stories.desc:
As a user, I expect the title of the legend to be the title of my results tab when using the explore view/feature inside the Results drawer so that the legend doesn't contain values unfamiliar to the user.

Steps to reproduce:

  1. Populate a search results drawer, e.g. do a send to grid on the Nursing Homes -> Nursing Home layer in the Content Tools -> Map Layers
  2. Select some number of results in the drawer, e.g. click the top left checkbox to select all nursing homes - they should appear as points on the map
  3. On the grid use the View button in the upper right to switch to Explore view.
  4. The legend entry for Nursing Home should now read Nursing Home by Address (note the capital A in `Address).
  5. Use the the Grid Tools -> Rename tool to change the name from Nursing Home to e.g. Blargus. The legend title entry should now read Blargus

stories.name: No Way to Select "Blank/Null" Distinct Values When Using The Search Function
stories.desc: As a user, I expect to be able to select "Null" or "Blank" values from the distinct values filter or leave the value blank to return results with no values for that field so that I can return results with only null/blank criteria. (See attached video)

stories.name: Custom Symbols Created Via "Explore View" Won't Remain When Changing Tabs in Results Drawer
stories.desc: As a user, I expect the custom symbols for which I applied using the Explore View to stay when navigating between tabs in the results drawer so that I don't have to recreate/redefine the custom symbology after switching tab. (See video attached)

stories.name: Update to 4Dv14 on dev and staging for benchmarks
stories.desc:
As a developer I want to upgrade to 4D v14.3 so that we can use objects to easily render JSON structures, and take advantage of a multitude of bug fixes and performance improvements. Monitoring capabilities will also be enhanced.

This is a prereq to upgrading anything to highcharts (namely the excess cascades)

stories.name: Provision infrastructure for 4Dv14.3 update (iB)
stories.desc: As a developer I want to...

stories.name: [IE9+] Functional Report legend should be left aligned
stories.desc:
As a IE9+ User I want the formatting on the functional report top section to be aligned correctly so that the website doesn't look wonky.

DoneDone Issue

stories.name: Add exceptions/transformations management tabs to DE Admin module
stories.desc: As an admin, I would like the ability manage a hospital's specific exceptions and transformations, in order to remove or add them to the hospital.

stories.name: Allow CORS requests from mock UI to staging API
stories.desc: As a developer I would like to be able to make data requests to my (local|staging) API application from the standalone UI so that the development cycle time is reduced for new UI features.

stories.name: Ignore the <85% rule for the following months:
stories.desc:
As a user I want to ignore the 85% threshold for the following data points so that they don't show up as "invalid peers" when viewing an INCONTROL report.

050235 - Sept 2012; 050278 - Jan 2014; 040017-Oct; Nov, Dec 2013; 040029 - Oct, Nov 2012

stories.name: Add exceptions/transformations management tabs to DE Admin module
stories.desc: As an admin, I would like the ability manage a hospital's specific exceptions and transformations, in order to remove or add them to the hospital.

stories.name: Create folders and/or stamp files with the login of the submitter so we can more easily associate files with the submitting hospital
stories.desc: As an iVantage admin, I need to be able to easily identify the submitter/submitting hospital so that I can properly move files around.

stories.name: Column to identify user who uploaded a file
stories.desc: As an iVantage admin, I need to know WHO loaded the file in addition to when the file was loaded so that I can know who to contact if there are issues.

stories.name: Create 2016 VBP calculator
stories.desc:
As a user I want a 2016 VBP calculator so that I know what the potential impact will be in 2016.

Detail: https://www.federalregister.gov/articles/2012/08/31/2012-19079/medicare-program-hospital-inpatient-prospective-payment-systems-for-acute-care-hospitals-and-the#h-447

Basics: http://www.stratishealth.org/documents/VBP_factsheet.pdf

stories.name: 2017 VBP calculator
stories.desc:
As a user I want a 2017 VBP calculator so that I know what the potential impact will be in 2017.

See page 9 of attachment for details

https://www.federalregister.gov/articles/2014/08/22/2014-18545/medicare-program-hospital-inpatient-prospective-payment-systems-for-acute-care-hospitals-and-the#h-293

stories.name: Add combined SSI measure for VBP 2016
stories.desc:
As a user I want the combined SSI scores to be calculated properly so that the 2016 VBP calculator follows CMS's instructions.

Data for Outcomes...sample https://data.medicare.gov/Hospital-Compare/Healthcare-Associated-Infections-Hospital/77hc-ibv8

http://www.qualityreportingcenter.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/HVBP_021715_Overview-FY2017.pdf - see pages 16-7 for extra detail

stories.name: Weight expected payment and revenue lost based on domains that meet minimum criteria
stories.desc:
https://vbp.ivantagehealth.com/web/?providerid=271318

As a rural hospital I want my revenue lost in the financial impact box to add up to the rev lost columns on the cascades so that my numbers foot if I am not eligible for all domains.

stories.name: Program Coordinator Specific Section in PUMA
stories.desc:
As a Program Coordinator I need a place to manage my users and their use of the products. As a Program Coordinator, I want to be able to add and delete people from my facility without having to reach out to iVantage. As a Program Coordinator I want control over what the people in my facility can see or access. As an analyst, it is helpful to me for the client to take on the burden of managing the users. The user information will be more current and reliable if iVantage gets out of the middle of the process.

Why I need this done

  • Trinity wants to be able to manage their users in Indicator and KW
  • We are trying to prepare for a possible (likely?) Trinity update this summer.
  • We hope to be transitioning Indicator to PUMA/CAML in Q2.
  • Therefore, we need to have this done before INdicator moves over to PUMA/CAML
  • Many other clients like to manage their own people, too.

stories.name: Delete user bug
stories.desc:
https://ivantage.mydonedone.com/issuetracker/projects/18184/issues/43

As a puma admin, Puma should delete users for me when I ask it to, even if they have outstanding password reset requests, because I'm supposed to be the one in charge here.

Why I need this done

  • I continually look for "technical debt" in the user processes - to make things as easy, streamlined and consistent as possible for the Client Services and other teams.
  • Having this exception hanging out there makes training the CS peeps difficult.

stories.name: Unable to delete Partner from PUMA (Staging)
stories.desc:
Currently receiving a 500 error when attempting to delete partner with Medicare ID 10009 from PUMA staging.

Why I need this done

  • Since PUMA develops the system heirarchies based on parent-child relationships, we need clear rules about deleting partners within the heirarchy - so we don't do something stupid - like delete all of Trinity.

stories.name: Remove "Create an Account" from the login page
stories.desc:
As a User, if I see a create an account link, I figure I can create an account and get access to products. In reality, when an unknown e-mail creates an account, it goes into an odd loop - it tells me I don't have access to Incontrol and bounces me to the login page on the marketing site. It's weird. As an Analyst and Client Service Team Member, when a user creates an account, I need to know about it! Right now, a user is created in new PUMA w/ a name of nullnull and just the e-mail.

Why I need this done

  • IF a client or potential client clicks on it, they get the impression that they've created an account.
  • Unfortunately, analysts have no way of knowing there's been a "new user" request.
  • We risk having random people in PUMA, without access.
  • Big client dissatisfer if they believe they've signed up and we have no clue.
